explains: vt. 娇养；溺爱（等于 mollycoddle）；用文火煮

sentences.en: I would not coddle the child.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意溺爱这个孩子。

sentences.en: Teach him gently, World, but don't coddle him.
sentences.cn: 世界，你应该温柔地教导他，切不可溺爱他。

sentences.en: I love to coddle babies. I have a little one of my own.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢悉心照料宝宝，我自己就有个小宝贝。
